entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 40%
